name: Prehensile Hair
description:
Created for GDKO Round 1 (Create a playable character with a unique ability)

This character has Prehensile Hair, meaning she can use her hair to grab on to things. The hair will follow your mouse. If you left click while the end of the hair is over a black tile it will grab on to the tile. Then the other strand of hair will start following your mouse. You can move around the area in this way.
